author: Laura Prudom
title: Quibi Show Reviews: What to Watch and What to Skip
description: Get our quick reviews on the 24 scripted, unscripted, and documentary series that Quibi has launched with - which are worth your time, and which should you skip?
content: New streaming platform Quibi has officially launched, rolling out dozens of scripted shows (or, in Quibi terms, "movies in chapters"), unscripted series, and documentaries that are designed to be consumed in "quick bites" of 10 minutes or less. Each show has … [+22799 chars]
